ticker.name: ticker
ticker.description: Stock ticker symbol representing the company.

name.name: name
name.description: Company name associated with the ticker.

earnings_release_date.name: earnings_release_date
earnings_release_date.description: The date on which the company released its earnings report.

surprise_ratio.name: surprise_ratio
surprise_ratio.description: Earnings surprise ratio, showing the percentage difference between expected and actual EPS.

after_last.name: after_last
after_last.description: Performance of the stock after the last earnings release.

fiscal_year.name: fiscal_year
fiscal_year.description: Fiscal year in which the earnings report applies.

quarter.name: quarter
quarter.description: Fiscal quarter in which the earnings report applies.

eps.name: eps
eps.description: Earnings Per Share (EPS). A measure of profitability calculated as net income divided by outstanding shares.

pe_ttm.name: pe_ttm
pe_ttm.description: Price-to-Earnings (P/E) Ratio based on trailing twelve months (TTM) earnings.

close_price.name: close_price
close_price.description: Closing stock price on the earnings release date.

price_change.name: price_change
price_change.description: Absolute change in stock price compared to the previous close.

change_ratio.name: change_ratio
change_ratio.description: Percentage change in stock price compared to the previous close.

market_value.name: market_value
market_value.description: Market capitalization of the company, calculated as Share Price * Total Shares Outstanding.

volume.name: volume
volume.description: Total number of shares traded on the earnings release date.

turnover_rate.name: turnover_rate
turnover_rate.description: Turnover rate, showing the percentage of shares traded relative to total outstanding shares.

dividend.name: dividend
dividend.description: Dividend amount per share for the latest reporting period.

pre_close.name: pre_close
pre_close.description: Stock price at the close of the previous trading day.

fifty_high.name: fifty_high
fifty_high.description: Highest stock price reached in the last 52 weeks.

fifty_low.name: fifty_low
fifty_low.description: Lowest stock price reached in the last 52 weeks.

open_price.name: open_price
open_price.description: Opening stock price on the earnings release date.

high_price.name: high_price
high_price.description: Highest stock price reached on the earnings release date.

low_price.name: low_price
low_price.description: Lowest stock price reached on the earnings release date.

vibrate_ratio.name: vibrate_ratio
vibrate_ratio.description: Volatility ratio, measuring price fluctuation relative to the opening price.

insertion_timestamp.name: insertion_timestamp
insertion_timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when this record was inserted into the database.
